instruction: Generate an outline for a speech about the importance of language.
output:
I. Introduction – why language is critical
a. How it allows us to communicate 
b. Its ability to preserve history 
II. The power of language
a. Its ability to create understanding 
b. Its capacity to foster unity 
III. How language shapes cultures
a. Reflection of a society's values 
b. Crafts identity, relationships and community
IV. How language changes throughout time
a. Evolution of language 
b. Different dialects and accents 
V. Conclusion 
a. Language is integral to our lives and our bond with one another. 
b. We must continuously strive to use language to have an impact and enrich the lives of those around us. 
 §§.
